event.title: was also buried in the church on 22nd April 1598

data.event: It contains the recumbent effigy tomb of Lady Roesia de Verdun, foundress of the nearby Grace Dieu Priory, and Frances Beaumont, Justice of the Common Pleas, was also buried in the church on 22nd April 1598.
The original school was founded in 1843 and the present school was built in 1976.
The original school was founded in 1843 and the present school was built in 1976.
